name: Sierpinski Triangle - Generate your own Fractal
name_original: Sierpinski Triangle - Generate your own Fractal
description:
Create a Sierpinski Triangle self-similar fractal.

Tap/Click to place 3 starting dots on the screen (rough triangle pattern).
Tap/Click a 4th time to place starting dot (inside your triangle).

Press To Add Dots Button, adds a dot, half way between one of the 3 original dots (triangle points), and the first dot you placed. 
Subsequent dots are then created between that dot, and a random choice of the 3 triangle points.

Press To Cycle number of Dots – choose, 1, 10, 100, 1000 dots to be generated per Click.

Press to Change Dots Colour – choose red, green, blue dot colours.

Reset – Resets so you can try again with new starting dots.

Take a Screen shot of your image, share your creation, share a link so others can to :).
